item.title: DOOM The Dark Ages Tested: 13 GPUs Benchmarked To Hell And Back
item.description:
DOOM is backâ€”and it’s never looked meaner. DOOM The Dark Ages is the latest installment in Id Software’s iconic franchise, bringing a brutal blend of medieval mayhem and modern firepower. Powered by the id Tech 8 engine, this entry trades Mars for dark fantasy while keeping the brutal combat, metal soundtrack, and silky-smooth performance that DOOM is known for.

Naturally, we had to see how it runs.
